answers.answer: Yup I have.  With almost all of my and they can go either way for me.  I always seem to measure big.  Got to remember there is a placenta in there and fluid.  So always seem to carry more fluid than the average and mY placenta seem to be bigger too and weigh more than the ave.  I was told I was having a very large baby at 36 wks with my first like 9 #at 36 wks. He was born on due date at 7 12.  However I was told I was having a 8 lbs  and ended up with a 10# 2 oz baby. And I would measure 2-3 weeks and than a few weeks later it would go down and back up etc. I had two other babies 8# 11 and 8# 15.  I was measuring three weeks ahead back at 32 wks I think but than right at 36 wks at 36 wks but at 38 wks i was 39 cm.  I have my 40 wks appt tomorrow so well see what happens. But this baby went from thinking it small to now they think close to 9. Never had GD.  We'll just wait and see when this little one comes what size he/she is.

question: Had a doc appointment today. Baby girl is measuring 39weeks but I will be 36weeks tomorrow (she was usually measuring 2 weeks ahead not 3). Bp is slightly high this time... hopefully its just a fluke occurance.My question is... have any of you ladies had a baby that measured this large and NOT had gestational diabetes... and what was the result (early labor...??? Induction?)Im freaking out .. this will deff. Explain why I feel like shes going to Come out of my lung lol.
title: Fun Times
